item.title: Oh My Posh Prompt
item.description: Some information # Oh My Posh is a custom prompt engine for any shell that has the ability to adjust the prompt string with a function or variable. Itâ€™s beautiful, elegant and intuitive; if you use git from the command line it will be great for you.
